title: JabFox
name: jabfox
description: JabFox imports new bibliographic information directly from the browser into JabRef.
author: Tobias Diez

preferences.name: jabRefPath
preferences.title: Path to JabRef
preferences.description: The path of the executable file of JabRef, i.e. the install location of 'JabRef.exe'.

preferences.name: takeAutomaticSnapshots
preferences.title: Automatically take snapshots
preferences.description: Note: also changes the corresponding option for Zotero.

preferences.name: DeleteZoteroRecord
preferences.title: Delete Zotero Record
preferences.description: Note: Zotero entry is created before imported to Jabref. Should the entry be deleted after Jabref import?
